subject: Suits and Litigation
Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: Steve Mills, who recruited Anucha Browne Sanders to the Knicks, testified Wednesday that she came to his office in tears in late 2005 to tell him she was resigning.
snippet: Steve Mills, who recruited Anucha Browne Sanders to the Knicks, testified Wednesday that she came to his office in tears in late 2005 to tell him she was resigning.
